meta.title: Covid 19 Resources - LaRue County Public Schools

link.title: Hodgenville Elementary School - News

form.name: aspnetForm

p.span: The wellbeing of our LaRue County students and community are of the utmost importance. We have provided below a list of helpful resources concerning the outbreak of COVID-19. These are a culmination of both local and national resources. This is by no means an exhaustive list, but we believe it is a good place to start in regards to helping understand the issue and prepare necessarily.

p.a: COVID-19: Answers to FAQs for Kentucky’s Public School Families
COVID-19: Answers to FAQs for Kentucky’s Schools and Districts

span.a: How canceled events and self-quarantines save lives, in one chart
Kentucky Cabinet for Health & Family Services

div.div:
This is a secure Staff Intranet content page and cannot be viewed by the public. Please contact your Technology Director to gain access to the Staff Intranet area in order to view this page.
Thank you,
